description:
Job Description:

Client CRT team is responsible for supporting IA mobile platforms (phones/tablets) during launch/design process by providing feedback/advice to customer/client and working with different teams inside Intel on aspects which affect software systems.

As a member of Client CRT team, the candidate will be responsible for:
1. Responding to customer/client requests or events as they occur (apps verification on IA, performance optimization, applications development for Android/Windows 8).
2. Research activities related to SoC/Android/Win8 applications performance/power etc.


Qualifications:

Required Qualifications
1. Basic programming experience on Android platform
2. Basic knowledge of Linux tools

Preferred Qualifications:
1. Programming experience on other mobile platforms such as Win8 or iOS
2. Programming experience on desktop platforms such as Microsoft.NET framework
3. Firm grasp of programming tools such as compilers, linkers, and debuggers
name: Software Engineering Intern (718969)
